Target Size Optimization

Source: R/targetsize_optimization.R
targetsizeoptimization.Rd

Target Size Optimization in RCT.

targetsizeoptimization(
  y,
  treated,
  scores,
  m,
  delta,
  conditional = TRUE,
  increment = 0.1,
  plot = TRUE
)

Arguments

y

post-intervention churn dummy
treated

treatment dummy
scores

predictions
m

post-intervention cash flows
delta

intervention cost
conditional

conditional offer or not (default: TRUE)
increment

share of customers added at a time to build the campaign profit curve (default: .1)
plot

plot the campaign profit curve (default: TRUE)

Value

A list containing campaign profit curve, target sizes, maximum profit and related variables.

  • campaign.profit.curve

  • target.sizes

  • maxprofit

  • targetsize.maxprofit

  • maxprofit.trimmed

  • targetsize.maxprofit.trimmed

  • secondbesttargetsize.trimmed

  • increment
